website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one analog watch featuring tachymeter and compass housed in an 18K gold ion-plated stainless steel case.
pros: Glowing arrows illuminate the clock face in low light
The handy chronograph dials can function as a stopwatch
We love that it's durable enough to be worn every day, yet smart enough for evening use
cons: Buyers report the second hand is prone to coming loose inside

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch at a great price but...
customer_reviews.text: Okay you get what you pay for.. which in this case is something that would appear to cost a lot but it actually doesn't. Something has to give and that weak link is literally the links in the band on this watch. They just don't feel right, they feel cheap. I cant emphasize it enough its the only negative I can think of about this watch. Otherwise I love it fully functional, big and bold. It looks good just when you feel the band you know it couldn't be expensive. If that sounds okay with you than you'll love it, picture is accurate just be aware what case diameter refers to and what you already wear.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kriz

customer_reviews.title: Invicta does not disappoint. This gold colored timepiece is a good blend ...
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of both big faced and regular faced men's wristwatches, I have to say, Invicta does not disappoint. This gold colored timepiece is a good blend of macho and classy, but since it's brushed gold finish versus the shiny and sparkled one, I think the Aviator does a good job. This one looks like it will be a good casual or work business casual item to trot out to the office or to some Christmas parties coming very soon. The jeweler, who adjusted and removed a few links, commented on this in the positive manner. Amazon gave a very very good price on this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Walters

customer_reviews.title: chicly!
customer_reviews.text: an excellent brand, it looks better than the picture. Despite the large size they are chic and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: keti

customer_reviews.title: Water-resistant got water in after Return Period n p
customer_reviews.text: Return Window closed January 31, 2018. Yesterday, February 12, I noticed water in this supposedly water-resistant watch. Don't buy this watch. If you do buy it, don't shower or swim with it. If there was a Zero Star rating, I'll give you that!
customer_reviews.author: Jo greg

customer_reviews.title: One Beautiful Watch !
customer_reviews.text: I just received this watch today, it looks well made and it's beautiful. I read a couple of reviews and one said the red second hand fell off, ok out of how many thousands of this style watch is manufactured, just like new cars and other new items you can get a lemon, they warranty it for one year so that should ease the pain of a defect. I collect Invicta watches, I have quit a few of them and not one has malfunctioned yet ! Their watches are well worth the money, they keep excellent time and are very good looking. I just ordered another one with the black dial, Invicta Men's 17206 "AVIATOR" Stainless Steel .
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Another beautiful watch from Invicta
customer_reviews.text: Just got this watch today and it is a very nice looking timepiece . It's a heavy watch but not overly so as Invicta Watches like this have some weight to them . It looks much more expensive than it is and the bracelet is also well made . Definitely worth the price and would recommend it . I have other Invicta watches so I am hopeful this watch works as well as the others .
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, But . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is another great watch from Invicta -- big, manly (not sexist, just fits a bigger wrist at 48 mm.) The only issue I would change would be to make the hands more visually pronounced. Other than that, this watch is a great, very cost effective time piece that goes great for casual and more formal looks.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckster

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch was dead on arrival. Tried replacing battery and it only worked for 2 hours. I am very upset since Invicta has been a good brand all along. Update: I left it alone and it keeps time for a couple of hours then suddenly stops. the Chronograph doesnt work at all. I have to bang the watch on my palm for the second hand to get moving again. Overall I am very disappointed, the watch is outside the return window and I am sure warranty repair will not apply since it will cost me more to ship it back to manufacturer for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: F. Karanja

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Way too big for my wrist.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. It's just way too big for my wrist. I sent it back immediately after I saw how big it was. They should use a diagram to show how big the watch is.
customer_reviews.author: ijiguy

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful watch but hard to read the time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. It looks really expensive and is super high quality. The only problem is it is extremely hard to read the time but I bought it for jewelry effect to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Ironman Watch
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the watch very much. Only down side is I am left handed and like to wear the watch on that end. Problem is the buttons tend to hit my wrist setting off the timers and you are unaware of it. I ended up having to switch it to my right hand and trying to get used to it. It is heavy for a watch but seems to be well built. The reason I called my heading “Ironman Watch” is because one of my coworkers saw it on my wrist and asked if Ironman knew I stole his watch. Haha
customer_reviews.author: KSBirdman

customer_reviews.title: Look
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this watch. We did take out a few links cuz it was big around the wrist
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kicin

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw
customer_reviews.text: My watch was missing a screw on the back panel. Had to pay to get one added. Not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Eyes wide open
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful watch, nice weight, and wow when it catches the sun on lookers beware, have ur 😎 handy. Because it'll blind ya.

customer_reviews.text: Really Nice watch for the money. Has a great weight, But alittle large. The Band is way big. May fit Sasquatch out of the box but not likely you. But pretty easy to remove a few links.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it

I didn’t know he was a watch collector so I got major “cake” points.. this was worth the money. Beautiful watch.

customer_reviews.title: Not recomended
customer_reviews.text: Looks big in photo, small on wrist. Im a big guy and it is really smaller than i thought it would be.

customer_reviews.title: These watches are supposed to be high quality but I am rather disappointed in this one
customer_reviews.text: I have worn it a grand total of 3 times and the gold is coming off of the band. These watches are supposed to be high quality but I am rather disappointed in this one. It keeps time well and I haven't had any other issues with it.

This is a very large watch and my grandson is a very large young man and this watch was a perfect fit on him.This is a very beautiful watch and give the impressions that it cost more than it did,it came well packaged and was perfect to gift as it arrived, Thx

product_meta.title: Invicta Men's 17205 AVIATOR 18k Gold Ion-Plated Watch
product_meta.description:
With its most inspired creations yet, Invicta demonstrates its technical and design prowess, offering timepieces of style for extreme value.

"We have long held firm to the belief that supremely crafted timepieces can be offered for extremely modest sums. It is the founding principle of our flagship and the radical notion that still drives us today. By being true to our convictions, we will continue to turn the balance of power, and deliver true Swiss luxury to anyone who desires it. Let all those who possess our timepieces and pass through our doors witness the quality, value and care in every piece we create, and the spirit of never-ending possibilities in everything we do."

These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One.

 With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers. 

It takes years of training and a great deal of pride to achieve glorious Swiss timepieces by hand. But it takes guts and the courage of your convictions to make those timepieces affordable for everyone who appreciates them.

 At our Swiss workshops, we mix time-honored traditions with a little bit of horse sense every single day to produce the greatest values in the watch-making world. 



Sporting an intricate design and subdial system, this bold Invicta chronograph is precise on time and measurement.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :0.59 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 8.25 Ounces
 * Item model number :17205
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :May 16, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Invicta
 * ASIN :B00J082Q64
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Item can be shipped within U.S.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #80,451 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #397 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #20496 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars637 ratings

Let all those who possess our timepieces and pass through our doors witness the quality, value and care in every piece we create, and the spirit of never-ending possibilities in everything we do."

These are the words that greet visitors and motivate team members inside the Invicta Watch Group's new worldwide headquarters. Emblazoned in stainless steel, it has been the Invicta message since Day One.

 With each new timepiece, the company sends up a flare for those looking to be defined not by how much they spend, but how wisely they spend. With its strong collections, the gutsy Swiss brand is guaranteed to keep attracting followers. 

It takes years of training and a great deal of pride to achieve glorious Swiss timepieces by hand. But it takes guts and the courage of your convictions to make those timepieces affordable for everyone who appreciates them.

 At our Swiss workshops, we mix time-honored traditions with a little bit of horse sense every single day to produce the greatest values in the watch-making world. 



Sporting an intricate design and subdial system, this bold Invicta chronograph is precise on time and measurement.
feature_bullets: 18k gold ion-plated watch with logo on dial featuring tachymeter and compass on inner bezel
48 mm gold ion-plated stainless steel case with synthetic-sapphire dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display. Crystal Type-Flame Fusion
Features include fold-over clasp closure, chronograph subdials with 60-second, 60-minute, and 1/10-second functions, date window, and black ion-plated stainless steel bezel
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving.
